stack:stack.stack:script:
mkdir -p /etc/pki/tls/private mkdir -p /etc/pki/tls/certs
/usr/bin/openssl genpkey -algorithm RSA \ -out /etc/pki/tls/private/localhost.key \ -pkeyopt rsa_keygen_bits:4096
/usr/bin/openssl req -utf8 -new \ -key /etc/pki/tls/private/localhost.key \ -x509 -days 2000 -set_serial $(date +%s) \ -out /etc/pki/tls/certs/localhost.crt \ -config /etc/security/ca/ca.cfg -batch
# Force HTTPS access for serving kickstart files <Directory /var/www/html/install/sbin> AllowOverride None SSLRequireSSL SSLVerifyClient None Allow from all </Directory>
SSLCACertificateFile /etc/security/ca/ca.crt
mkdir -p /export/stack/pallets chmod ao+rx /export/stack chmod ao+rx /export/stack/pallets
